column2: MASSACHUSETTS PRACTICE PERMIT TEST
Question Text
1. Which sign has white letters on a red background?

3. Drive below the posted speed limit when:
column4: entering a highway where there are other cars.

column2: 4. How can you prevent fatigue on a long trip?
column4: Plan to drive long trips with a companion.
column8: Schedule regular stops for every couple of hours.

column2: 5. What do warning signs mean?
column4: Drivers are approaching a hazardous location.
column8: Drivers are approaching a location where there is a special rule.

column4: avoid driving on either side of the truck and don’t tailgate.
column10: never pass the truck and put your headlights on.

column2: 9. Parking is not allowed:
column4: within 250 feet of a traffic light.

column2: 13. Double solid yellow lines mean:

column6: passing is not permitted in either direction.
column8: the lane to the left may pass.

column2: 14. What is the main reason night driving is more difficult than daytime driving?
column4: The use of headlight is required by law.

column6: Drivers are coming to a point where another traffic lane joins the one they are on.

19. When following motorcycles, drivers should:

column8: try to pass them as they have different braking capabilities than other motor vehicles.

column2: 20. When you make a left turn from a one-way road into a one-way road, if the road you enter has two lanes, you:
column4: must go to the next intersection.
column6: must turn into its left lane.
column10: must turn into its right lane.

column2: 21. The ‘One Way’ sign means that:
column4: only vehicles turning left may travel in the direction of the arrow.
column6: there is only one road that turns left at the intersection.
column8: drivers may travel only in the direction of the arrow.

23. What should you do if your headlights suddenly go out?
column4: Ease your foot off the gas pedal and brake gently.
column6: Use your emergency lights, parking lights or directional signals.
column8: Ease your foot off the gas pedal and brake gently.
column10: Brake immediately and activate your emergency lights.

25. What does a flashing yellow light mean?
column4: The same thing as a stop sign.
column8: Drivers may move forward with caution.
